name: AURORA: THE RISING SUN
description: A game set in the future 80000 feet above earths atmosphere on a man made island. where the people are divided into 2 factions. where the antogonaists want to use the sun to their benefit and you dont want that. So the player has to use lighting bending techniques to defeat the enemies.  there are different types of  enemies who have thier own powers.  so you've to stop all and turn off the switch that saves mankind.
